profile:
We offer a wide range of plumbing and drain cleaning services, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
 
Our Technicians are dedicated to providing the best service possible. We'll fix that leak or unblock that drain but at the same time leave your home or business in Pristine condition. Our fully qualified technicians will turn up with a smile on their face, boot covers on, tools in hand, ready to provide the BEST service possible.
 
Every service call comes with a free home plumbing inspection. One of our knowledgeable technicians will be able to make you aware of any potential problems with your plumbing systems and give you advice on how to maintain them. 

https://blog.homestars.com/best-of-the-best-2020/
services:
We offer a wide range of plumbing and drainage services for both inside and outside of your home.
Our out side team specialize in perimeter drainage and water line replacements. We offer camera inspections, hydro flushing and even full replacement of perimeter drainage.
We can also take care of your plumbing needs inside the house, offering such services as fixing leaky faucets, replacing hot water tanks, unclogging drains and much more. No job is too big or too small for the Pristine Touch
brands: We install vast number of trusted brands such as, Moen, Delta, Waltec, American Standard, Bradford White, John Wood and many more.
name: Pristine Plumbing & Drainage

profile:
Since 1999, Mr. Swirl The Friendly Plumber offers fast, friendly plumbing repairs, maintenance and installation for all your plumbing and drainage needs. Our expert plumbing technicians work 24/7 throughout Vancouver and across the Lower Mainland. You can trust our expert plumbers with all your plumbing and drainage needs. 

We offer fast, friendly service - when you need it - at a price that's fair. Give us a ring! Or swing by our swell website.
service_area: Vancouver, North Vancouver, West Vancouver, Burnaby, Coquitlam, Port Coquitlam, Port Moody, Pitt Meadows, Maple Ridge, Mission, Langley, Surrey, White Rock, Richmond, Delta, Abbotsford,
services:
Residential and Commercial Plumbing and Drain Cleaning services.

House Plumbing:
Repair leaking sinks & faucets, broken showers & toilets, water pipes. Install new faucets, sinks, toilets & showers, water pipes. Repair: leaking pipes, clogged drains, broken garbage disposals, dishwasher pipes. Install: sinks, faucets, garbage disposals and all other kitchen plumbing fixtures. Fix & install sump pumps & water lines. Drains & Sewers: drain cleaning & repairs; fix, maintain and install septic tanks; sewer cleaning; sewer line repairs; repair and install storm drainage; perform hydro jetting & pipeline inspections. Repair and install hot water tanks and tankless water heaters. Commercial Plumbing: fix and install grease traps, garbage disposals, tank water heaters; repair, install and maintain all kitchen & bathroom plumbing needs from toilets, to sinks, to pipes.
brands: John Wood, Giant, Toto, Thermosol, Rheem, American Standard, Delta, Moen
specialities: Mr. Swirl specializes in all Plumbing & Drain services for homes and businesses. No job is too big or too small!
payment_method: We accept Credit Cards & Cash Payments
project_minimum: No job is ever too big or too small
warranty_terms: Your Guarantee is marked on the bottom of your invoice. Length of guarantee depends on type of work
name: Mr Swirl The Friendly Plumber

profile:
Red Seal Drainage & Plumbing Inc. is a full service plumbing and drain cleaning company operating in the Greater Vancouver Regional District.  We specialize in residential service plumbing and drainage, as well as general maintenance and repair for commercial and residential customers. Our courteous and respectful team is committed to providing honest, quality work from experienced, reliable plumbers. We look forward to working with you. 

First time customers and senior citizens (65+) receive a 10% discount when you mention this.

profile:
Vancouver is our home, and as a family owned and operated business, we strive every day to provide the best possible services for our friends and neighbors. Weâ€™re a community-based business, which is why we offer the lowest prices guaranteed, senior discounts, and fast and reliable services.
 
With more than 30 years of combined experience in the industry, Speedy Plumbing is a name you can trust for all of your plumbing, drainage, and heating services. We help with trenchless waterlines, waterline replacement, plumbing, drainage, perimeter drain services, water line repair, hot water tanks, and strata and property managers. 
 
If you find yourself in need of plumbing services, give us a call at one of our many Vancouver area offices and discover what it means to receive the best possible plumbing services from a business that views you as a friend.
 
Speedy Plumbing and Rooter offers the following benefits to all customers:
 
Prompt, 60-minute service
Guaranteed lowest prices
Free estimates
Price beat guarantee
24/7 service and repairs
Senior discounts offered
Specials and promotions

profile:
Ashton Service Group has been in business for 29 years and has earned an excellent reputation for our 100% customer satisfaction by doing it right the first time every time. 
Ashton Service Group's hand-picked team members are dedicated professionals who share the company's vision for excellence. We only have licensed and certified technicians and registered apprentices.
We can help you with your plumbing, heating or cooling needs for your home. We proudly service Metro Vancouver from our office in Richmond BC.
service_area: Burnaby, Coquitlam, Delta, Ladner, Langley, Maple Ridge, New Westminster, North Delta, North Vancouver, Port Coquitlam, Port Moody, Richmond, South Delta, South Surrey, Surrey, Tsawwassen, Vancouver, West Vancouver and White Rock.
products:
We are not a wholesaler or retailer of parts or materials. We are a service company that can supply and install the brands you want or make recommendations on what product would best fit your needs.
We do not offer duct cleaning or service fireplaces.
services: Plumbing, Heating, Air Conditioning, Gas, Drain Cleaning, Trenchless, Pipe Bursting, Air filtration and Ventilation, Tankless Water Heaters, Furnaces, Boilers, Heat Pumps, Air Conditoners, Mini Splits and Ductless Splits etc.
brands: We can supply, install and repair almost any brand. Please see our website for details at www.ashtonservicegroup.com or call our office for more information at 604-283-2383.
specialities: Ashton Service Group services and installs a lot of furnaces, boilers, tankless hot water heaters and heat pumps. We also now are installing more air conditioners such as Mr. Slims, ductless split and mini splits as customers are requesting them more and our summer weather is getting hotter.
